Description: AWS CloudFormation Template to create an AD Connector and associated resources for seamless domain join and networking.

VPCId.Description: VPC ID where AD Connector will reside

SubnetIds.Description: Subnet IDs for the AD Connector deployment

OnPremisesDNSIpAddresses.Description: List of DNS IP addresses of the on-premises domain controllers

DomainName.Description: The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the on-premises directory

ServiceAccountPassword.Description: The password for your service account on your on-premises directory, stored in SSM

CreateSeamlessDomainJoinResources.Description: Whether to create resources for Seamless Domain Join for EC2 instances

CreateDomainMembersSecurityGroup.Description: Whether to create a security group for domain members with inbound rule for PrivateIP communications

CreateDHCPoptionsSet.Description: Whether to create a DHCP options set pointing to the domain DNS servers

Properties.GroupDescription: Security Group for Seamless Domain Join EC2 instances
Security group for domain member communication
